text: Aey nabi! (apni ummat say kaho kay) jab tum apni biwiyon ko tallaq dena chahao to unn ki iddat (kay dino kay aaghaaz) mein unhen tallaq do aur iddat ka hisab rakho aur Allah say jo tumhara perwerdigar hai dartay raho na tum enhen inn kay gharon say nikalo aur na woh (khud) niklen haan yeh aur baat hai kay woh khuli buraee ker bethen yeh Allah ki muqarrar kerda hadden hain jo shaks Allah ki haddon say aagay barh jaye uss ney yaqeenan apney upper zulm kiya tum nahi jantay shayad iss kay baad Allah Taalaa koi naee baat peda ker dey
